title: The Crooked Crow
description: This is the tale of the crooked crow Kako from the Pachaihara forest. A forest from long ago, renowned for its serene beauty and for being an abode of happy beings of every kind. Follow Kako's journey from Pachaihara forest to the dreaded Droom woods and back again till he meets his destiny at the wings of Chiruvee, a sweet and kind hearted sparrow.
author: A.R. Sara
